contentList.content:
While the ersatz eye is equipped, you receive a +1 Strength bonus.

A hollow bead of white glass, carefully painted to resemble a realistic eye. Its tarnished brass fittings hum with a tinge of magic.

While the ersatz eye is equipped, you receive a +1 Dexterity bonus.

A hollow bead of white glass, carefully painted to resemble a realistic eye. Its tarnished brass fittings hum with a tinge of magic..

While the ersatz eye is equipped, you receive a +1 Constitution bonus.

A hollow bead of white glass, carefully painted to resemble a realistic eye. Its tarnished brass fittings hum with a tinge of magic.

While the ersatz eye is equipped, you receive a +1 Intelligence bonus.

A hollow bead of white glass, carefully painted to resemble a realistic eye. Its tarnished brass fittings hum with a tinge of magic.

While the ersatz eye is equipped, you receive a +1 Wisdom bonus.

A hollow bead of white glass, carefully painted to resemble a realistic eye. Its tarnished brass fittings hum with a tinge of magic.

While the ersatz eye is equipped, you receive a +1 Charisma bonus.

A hollow bead of white glass, carefully painted to resemble a realistic eye. Its tarnished brass fittings hum with a tinge of magic.

While the ersatz eye is embedded in your eye socket, you can see through the tiny orb as though it were a normal eye.

A hollow bead of white glass, carefully painted to resemble a realistic eye. Its tarnished brass fittings hum with a tinge of magic.

While the ersatz eye is embedded in your eye socket, you can see through the tiny orb as though it were a normal eye. When equipped, it grants a +1 bonus to Charisma.

A hollow bead of white glass, carefully painted to resemble a realistic eye. Its tarnished brass fittings hum with a tinge of magic.

While the ersatz eye is embedded in your eye socket, You become immune to blindness, can see invisible creatures, and can also use the Disintegrate ability once per short rest.

A hollow bead of white glass, carefully painted to resemble a realistic eye. Its tarnished brass fittings hum with a tinge of magic.
This Magic Box exists only for 10 rounds. It contains the item VoloErsatzEye. The box will disappear after 10 rounds.
